text: How can a mortal resist him!
Alphonse Dolmancé's mastery of debauchery and his alliance with Slaanesh have granted him insights into the construction and management of establishments dedicated to sinful pleasures.

Alphonse Dolmancé's unwavering devotion to Slaanesh enhances his ability to inspire and lead those who serve the Lord of Excess. His presence significantly boosts the efficiency and output of Devotee buildings in his domains.
His mastery of the art of fragrance not only enhances his personal presence but also bestows a mystical aura upon his troops.
Alphonse Dolmancé's unwavering devotion to Slaanesh has drawn the favor of the Dark Prince upon certain units within his ranks. His mastery of debauchery and devotion grants a unique boon

Alphonse Dolmancé's overwhelming narcissism and obsession with his own image have a peculiar and supernatural impact on his surroundings. His belief in his own perfection is so potent that it imparts a mesmerizing effect on those who follow him, driving them into a frenzy of self-adoration and recklessness.
He carries with him a unique elixir that enhances his own vitality and, when shared, bolsters the resilience of those under his command.
He has a unique understanding of elixirs, concoctions, and the manipulation of substances. He employs his knowledge to craft tinctures that both seduce and intoxicate

Alphonse Dolmancé, an agent of pleasure and decadence, possesses a unique talent for blurring the lines between the extravagant and the humble. In his presence, even the lowly peasant units revel in the same ecstasy as their more exalted counterparts, fighting with newfound vigor on the battlefield.
